Logged into Asus chat, and the tech did everything he could to try and help, in the end I had to send it back to Amazon, 5 stars to Amazon for sending the replacement out before they had the defective one back.Second one arrived the next day, connected to wifi with no issues, and once again wanted to download the update.  This time it downloaded and installed no problem.At this point I have had the tablet almost 6 months and I am satisfied with it.Its not the biggest powerhouse on the market, for $150 I expect it to lag sometimes, and it does when opening aps, or typing in windows, but overall I'm pretty happy with it, and feel it was worth the price. The screen is pretty nice, I'm a little old school so I still don't see the big deal with all the HD technology, and I really wouldn't know it unless someone pointed it out. So far I've used it for web browsing, watching videos, some games, and reading.I have a micro SD installed but have not had any issues other people reported with the card unmounting itself, so far its working fine.So one star off from the first one that I got that messed up less than 30 minutes after turning on, other than that experience its a good entry level tablet for people looking to test them out without breaking the bank.

Reviews.Title: It works well!
Reviews.Author: dwight lindstedt
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews prior to ordering.  It seems like the plus were greater than the minus.  I have a Asus laptop so I knew the quality of the brand was excellent.  This tablet works very well, however the battery life could be better.  It seems like I am charging the battery every day or so.  As long as I am at a place where it can be charged that is not a problem.  I worry, however, if I am on an extended trip if it will be usable for a long period.

Reviews.Title: Perfect device
Reviews.Author: Mark Kofman
Reviews.Content: Actually, this device my small kids use. They like it so much - all games, painting apps, movie makers, learning apps, e-book readers and much more.This device is pretty compact, fast and strong. Has a good sound and video quality.Excellent gift for very democratic price.I can recommend this mini-tablet to everyone who looks for something larger and comfortable then a regular smartphone but don't need a normal laptop.

Reviews.Title: Best buy ever!
Reviews.Author: A C Wilcox
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with my purchase. It is exactly what I needed. Works great! After much research this is the tablet that I chose.

Reviews.Title: what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Philip Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is what I was looking for when I bought my last pad.  Fast, clear, responsive and compact.  Also within the price range I was looking for.  A mid point between a PC and my old palm pilot.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Shawn E Bonifas
Reviews.Content: I bought this when it was still fairly new and I don't think you could beat it for the price on a new tablet.  It's not going to be as fast as the higher end models but it gets the job done.  We use it mainly for videos for the kids and having a MicroSD slot is great.  If you're looking for something to play the latest resource intensive Android games you probably want to look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Curlene Wise
Reviews.Content: Price was very good. I received it very fast. Works well. Looks just like it was pictured. No problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Well Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: lrtab
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 28 year old son for Christmas.  From the first time he used it, he was in awe of the capabilities of it.  Three months later and he is still loving it!

Reviews.Title: Asus Memopad HD7 16 inch
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great value for money Tablet.Excellent and very responsive screen.I bought this for my daughter,who is happy with this tablet.There is almost no lagtime and display resolution is excellent.However the download speed can be slow on wifi.I am unable to find a appropriate cover and case for this in India.Please someone,help me.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT for the price
Reviews.Author: Niklaus Schroeder
Reviews.Content: As a poor college student, I wanted to buy myself a tablet, but it needed to be affordable. There in lies the problem. I search high and low, but was never satisfied with either the price, or the hardware in the device. Finally my dreams came true. I found the MeMOPad. It has awesome battery life (like 4+ hours on Netflix with max screen brightness), a decent processor, awesome native apps, and an SD card slot that supports up to 32 gigs of extra storage. Unlike some other android devices, without rooting, and with the proper app, you can store many apps on the external storage card.The screen is crystal clear, and the tablet has an app to adjust the color settings on the device to make the screen more comfortable to read off of. I have used the camera, and even though it has a smaller megapixel resolution than others, both cameras worked extremely well with very good HD quality video.For the price this tablet is unmatched. I love mine and use it every day.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I researched various tablets, as I wanted to change from the Kindle (I found it too restrictive and it did not allow us to take advantage of the various B&N; gift cards). I had purchased the Samsung Galaxy 3 for my mom and though it was nice, it did not have the quad processor. The Google Nexus 7 had the quad processor but did not have the dual cameras. I found this and it has a everything and was cheaper then both of the others. It has worked great since Christmas (and my son puts it through constant use). So far it has been an excellent deal.

Reviews.Title: i Love this tab
Reviews.Author: Suinbeda
Reviews.Content: This tablet is fast. Video is awesome, the sound could be better. The size I think is perfect. Battery life seems to be great so far.

Reviews.Title: great bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: kirt antoine
Reviews.Content: considering the price this tablet is really great. the front facing camera is really grainy but otherwise its a great lil tablet

Reviews.Title: awesome awesome awesome
Reviews.Author: Simone M "Simone M"
Reviews.Content: This thing works wonders, I've done all my homework assignments with this tablet, and the HD screen just makes it more better, it takes amazing pictures, play with it a little and see what different tricks it has, and the price isn't bad at all, highly suggested

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the price
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: It is a good product for the price. The speed is excellent compared to a dual core. The image resolution is excellent. The 5mp camera takes excellent photos and video with good color and decent for image stabilization.What I don't like. My eyes tend to hurt after using for long periods of time. Sound volume drops when you plug in external speakers instead of headphones. Trouble finding a cover that would work for the 5mp camera. Most are minor inconveniences.I would definitely recommend it to someone else.

Reviews.Title: Great tablets for kids
Reviews.Author: Jay Henman
Reviews.Content: It Works great. Have had no problems at all and have had them for 2 months now and still going strong

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet...problems with battery percentage meter
Reviews.Author: C. L. Cecil "ouchie"
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great for the price point.  It could do with 2 gb of ram as some games and YouTube stutter a bit.  Quad core is pretty useless if it only has 1 gb of ram--it produces a bottleneck.I bought two and one of them immediately started having a battery problem.  It would charge fine but if you restarted or powered it on without it being plugged in, it would report as having 1% battery left and then shut off.  It was incorrect because the tablet was indeed charged 100%.  You had to make sure you turned it on while it was plugged in for it to report correctly.  I contacted Asus and they wanted me to send it in for warranty service and we would have to be without it for a couple weeks.  This wasn't going to cut it because we used that one for my autistic son and he wasn't going to tolerate it being gone (he wouldn't have understood why).  I wanted Asus to charge me for a new one, let me return that one, and then have them refund the money upon receipt of my return.  They were not willing to do this--a major lapse on their part I feel.  Even though it was after the initial 30 days, a VERY helpful Amazon rep sent me one OVERNIGHT and let me return the malfunctioning one.  Yay Amazon!Now the replacement is having similar battery reporting issues.  It had powered off for low battery last night, I plugged it in while off for a bit, then turned it on.  It reported that it was charging and was at 7%.  It remained as 7% for an hour!  I tried different cables and chargers, still would not increase.  I turned it off and let it charge for a bit while off.  When I turned it on it reported having 40%.  It was charging the whole time, but the meter was not changing.  I have a different battery app on it and both were reporting incorrectly, therefore I must assume it must be something about the hardware around the battery.I really hope this doesn't get to be like the one I returned.  My son relies on this tablet and I hate worrying if it's going to reliably charge or not.  I have to check on it like it's a baby.  Very silly.Otherwise, the screen is good...good responsiveness.  I would recommend to others with slight reservations.  I wish the battery was user replaceable/swappable.

Reviews.Title: Just the right size for me
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I use this mostly for entertainment. It's a great, portable size. I pull out my laptop when I get frustrated at the lack of keyboard. It does allow me to quickly check on shipment statuses on the go and check email. These are the only two functions that help me from a business stand point at this time.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for organization!
Reviews.Author: David Galli
Reviews.Content: Great device for work! Has everything you need to get organized because everything syncs to Google. I docked 1 star for the stock apps that are installed which can't be removed. If you are considering a tablet, this is a great tablet at a great price. Plenty of space with the extra MicroSD card (sold separately). The only issue is you cannot move apps to the SD. Only personal files and pictures or videos. All-in-all, a great little tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Polzin
Reviews.Content: I have old HP touchpad tablet si converted to android.  ASUS works muc smoother.  7" size is convenient to carry more like a paperback book.  e readers including Kindle work great.  Can display movies fine.  Some website do not work because Android no longer supports flash player.by ADOBE.  The softkeys at bottom are great.  Good display and like to backup to an SDCARD.  Best bang for buck in the 7" tablets with Android.

Reviews.Title: This is what I have been waiting for.
Reviews.Author: Michael "Mikehattan"
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful find.....I cannot recommend this underestimated little gem enough.I welcome and value this very worthwhile addition between my communication devices.

Reviews.Title: I am so happy with this item
Reviews.Author: Lyneigh
Reviews.Content: The tablet works great, excellent picture and sound quality as well, I would recommend this to anyone, this is everything I wanted from a tablet and more

Reviews.Title: the volume level is low
Reviews.Author: Robert Krzyzanowski
Reviews.Content: I show a lot of video clips from JW.ORG that I've downloaded and find that if there is any noise in the area that the video is hard to hear.  all is well when all is quiet but I really am disappointed in not being able to get a good sound.  my husband has the same pad in navy and his sound is a little stronger. there is no app to make it louder. im ready to resell and pick up a better brand.

Reviews.Title: Southerxside
Reviews.Author: Jesus rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Price is really good. I bought it for my 2 year old daughter it lags a little bit but above all i like it.

Reviews.Title: Quality Tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: RICARDO I JAMES
Reviews.Content: Nice quality tablet for the price, no problems thus far. Nice neat size, Asus made it to be quite functional and allows good multitasking. For example if u need a calc app to run on top of another app currently in use.

Reviews.Title: great tablet , i fully recomended
Reviews.Author: green
Reviews.Content: Was skeptic because of the price , i get the memo pad 16gb its been almost 3 months since i bought it , and still i don't see a downside, it's fast great sound, HD video quality, light weight, bottom line i love this device.  Small detail the shell creeks sometimes material quality is standard might feel low quality, but fear not the device wont break in your hands and that comes from a 240 pounds man.

Reviews.Title: the most cost-effective tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: this is the third asus tablet, i really enjoy it (watching kindle book, movies and games) without any issues for 3 month.i recommend protective film and case for this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kenyada Henderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my husband for Christmas and he LOVES it, it is always attached to his hand. He especially loves the dual cameras. I also own an Asus laptop that is over 4 years old and still works wonderfully; this is a reliable brand that I trust, which is why I chose this tablet.

Reviews.Title: My wife love this tablet !
Reviews.Author: JFD
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet, as a gift for my wife. She loves it!It was acquired in the black Friday at an excellent price for the quality of the product.Very good definition of screen and excellent performance for the price.I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: G. Keenan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent, although I cannot compare it to any other tablets as it is my first, I found the screen  quality excellent for watching downloaded tv shows, much better than I expected. WiFi seems to perform as good if not better than any of my other expensive devices (laptops, desktops). Its a very entertaining device for the money. I am now a tablet convert.

Reviews.Title: No way to beat this tablet in 7HD format
Reviews.Author: sidney saxon
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 5 of these tablets, 2 for me and my wife. The grand boys came over before Christmas and played around with it and was hooked. So their mother had me order 3 more, 2 for boys and 1 for my granddaughter. They have been rough on theirs and it still held up under those VERY ROUGH BOYS. Mine, I use all day every day.Great product and I ordered 2 other tablets before sending them back because there was bugs and really slow, to operate and the WLAN device was very slow. Hope this helps someone to decide.

Reviews.Title: my new magic portable friend !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Mckee
Reviews.Content: luv my new tablet. simple and uncluttered. i have an old computer and now I know I will be ok because I have a great back up plan! thanks lynn.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Douglas L. Cabana
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 7-year-old daughter.  I was a little hesitant; she did well with using my iPad but would delete programs or have issues playing her games so I was worried she is have issues with an Android device.  This has been great for her, she maneuvers through it without any issues, and the tablet works great.

Reviews.Title: great tablet under $150
Reviews.Author: jose sarabia
Reviews.Content: even if you buy it new its best if you give it a hard reset, if you don't the tablet seems to try to open all the apps at once and causes it to crash form time to time, make sure you have the tasks manager in the floating tabs to clear out all the task it may open without your knowlege

Reviews.Title: Great for School
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend and we both love it. We love it so much i decide to buy myself the same version of this one. Great for Schooling, leisure, and business.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMoPad
Reviews.Author: Bruce Kalashian Auto Spec
Reviews.Content: I really anjoy it!  It has many good APS and it runs all the APS I put in.  The GPS is why I replaced my old one.  I put in Google Sky Map and it is soooo cool.  I always wanted to star gaze but the old charts make it very hard to know what you're looking at.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: Dan Schmitt
Reviews.Content: I was dead set on getting a Galaxy Tab 3, until I came across this. My review is simple: the features offered for the price it's offered at...nothing compares. Worth ever cent and more.Although I was a diehard Samsung guy, I bought this and also bought an Asus G750JX-DB71 gaming laptop. In my opinion, Asus is a contender for some of the best stuff on the market today.

Reviews.Title: Not Just for Children and Teenagers
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Writer"
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech wiz in the least, yet I desired to own a tablet to use away from my desk for writing, internet activities, and inline videos. I use it for other things as well. It works great for what I need to do. It has been reviewed as a great entry tablet for children and teens, yet it works for adults as well who may not have a lot of money and aren't trying to play games. It comes with 16GB of storage space and a micro USB port to add additional storage. Sometimes I have to press twice to activate an app, yet it could be me since I have to do the same thing with other devices (remember, I'm not tech savvy). I am quite pleased with my tablet. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet in it's class
Reviews.Author: S. Saxon
Reviews.Content: I've had my Memo pad for about 4 month's and I'm a computer guru. For the price, nothing can touch its performance, battery life, hardware, or screen. I ordered 3 different tablets before I got this one. By the way, it's WLAN is great and the download speeds are twice as fast as others I tested. Trust me, for the price you cannot beat it !!

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it!
Reviews.Author: singermom
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husband to use for podcasts, audio books and of course surfing the web.  Fast processing, lightweight and clear, bright display.

Reviews.Title: Not sure I can help much, but a Subject line is required...
Reviews.Author: JeepNut
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a family member but it was a gift from a different family member who's married to my best friend, and her GRANDDAUGHTER hasn't said there's been any problems with it.  So it must be good.

Reviews.Title: Asus tablet a very well built affordable tablet that has all the bells and whistles.
Reviews.Author: lennie hulo
Reviews.Content: This tablet has met all my expectations and then some. I was pleased to find the quality of the Asus tablet was great. I researched many tablets before I decided on this one and I am very happy with my choice. I have had the Asus  tablet since Christmas and have not had any issues what so ever. I would  have given it five stars but I have only had it such a short time.

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Alex Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my little sister! They loved it, it handles the myriads of apps they download and never lags!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet just needs better screen
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great tablet just make sure you get a case. Keep in mind the screen is not gorilla glass which means if you aren't careful this screen will cracked easily other than that phenomenal tablet. Fast and very responsive

Reviews.Title: great for a newbie like me.
Reviews.Author: Melinda McCarthy
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I really like it. It does everything I want it to do. I love the convenience vs my old laptop. I am still getting used to the on screen keyboard and some email/internet work is easier to do on my laptop

Reviews.Title: Too Heavy & Not As Nimble as Kindle
Reviews.Author: E Miller
Reviews.Content: I had this Asus for about a month. It was quite heavy, and felt clunky and didn't respond to touch as well as I expected. I teamed it with a Bluetooth keyboard, and they never seemed to sync well. I was down with the flu for a week, and tried to stream video, and do all the internet stuff I would normally do at the pc., but I just got tired, frustrated. The price was good, but not the quality I wanted. I replaced it with a Kindle Fire HDX, and have been extremely happy ever since.

Reviews.Title: Good bur could be better
Reviews.Author: abrar
Reviews.Content: The asus memopad is a grwat tablet. It has a fast processor which can handle most games but some are very laggy. The battery can last up to 8 hours. However when you olay graphically intense games it loses battery life rapidly about 1%evety two minutes games like fifa 14. However if you play small games like flappybird and just surf the web and stuff you will have about 5 hours of battery life. Daily optimizes are requiredif you want the battery to last longer. In conclusion great device ciuld be better

Reviews.Title: I like this tablet, its very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Vallejo "malchuchaki"
Reviews.Content: I was thinkin a lot about buying a tablet and i was searching to much, i saw a lot of reviews in youtube, and i found this tablet, the price is really nice, because the tablet is fast, nice screen, the software is good, wifi works very good, front camera is good, but i dont like the rear camera too much, because my wife have a samsung galaxy tab, and the camera is better and it is less resolution, the plastic is ok for the price.If you dont have to much money or you dont want to spend to much money in a tablet and you want good stuff i recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Best Entry Tablet
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Bledsoe "RC Jet Freak"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before picking up 2 of these. I was getting tablets for my 9yo twins, so I was looking at price, durability, and something that they could grow with. I didn't want to by some child specific built tablet which some were even higher priced than the ASUS or the cheaper ones that didn't get very good reviews. In my weeks of research it became evident that the best bang for the buck for this size entry level tablet was between this and the Nexus 7. Both have their pros and cons but they are pretty close in comparison. Everything will tell you the Nexus 7(newer model) is best but it will cost you more too. They said the new ASUS MEMO HD was closely designed to the previous Nexus 7. For me it was not worth the price difference since this was going to be for my kids first tablets. These also had the sd card expansion the Nexus does not. We have had these for about a month and they are used non-stop by my boys. If you are used to using and android based smart phones you will have a easy learning curve in setting up and using these tablets. It runs fast. We have had no issues with internet or running games. My boys run Netflix constantly and there has been no lag. This also has a front and rear camera with decent quality. I set them up with Skype accounts so they can video chat with the grandparents anytime they want. Looked good on our end and my parents said the picture on their end was good too. I find myself grabbing their tablets a lot to use vs. my laptop or cell phone now. I think the viewer angles are good. The only "con" I can see as noted by others is this unit does show finger prints easily. But that is only a issue depending on how the light hits it and come on, how hard is it to just wipe it off. They do sell screen protectors for this that helps with this issue, but honestly ours is in a case and I always tell the boys to wash there hands before they use them. Battery life is really good. My boys can use them almost non-stop playing games, streaming movies, internet, etc. and it would be at 20-30% battery life. This has parent control features but I have not set them up. This is a good entry level tablet and perfect size for portability. Will fit in your purse with a case easily ladies. We bought the Procase ASUS MeMO Pad HD Protective case here on Amazon which fit perfect and are very durable( Also come with free stylus). If you been looking at this tablet or want a good entry level tablet this is it. I honestly don't know why anyone would need to spend 300+ for a tablet. If your one of those people who can do everything from their phone but just would like to have a bigger screen to look at then this is your answer. Were happy, and we got 2 for less than 1 in the higher end models. This is perfect for those of us on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Eric H
Reviews.Content: Awesome Tablet for the money. Bought it as a gift for my mother after almost pulling the trigger on the slightly more expensive Nexus 7 (2013). Saved a bit of money on this and it's absolutely perfect for her needs. Great size/weight, good screen, and works flawlessly so far. Highly recommended if you're in the market for a 7inch tablet.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: the kids love these tablets they work great and are way better then the last ones we got them these things are fast and work great no issues yet.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: Carolyn P. Woods
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be satisfactory in every way.  I selected this particular one based on other reviews from customers.

Reviews.Title: It worked great for 6 weeks
Reviews.Author: Kimberly74
Reviews.Content: This seems like a great little tablet for the money while it works. It was purchased as a Christmas present for my son in an effort to wrestle back control of my iPad. Unfortunately for me most of his favorite toddler apps (Endless ABCs and a few others) were not available on this version and he still preferred mine. While it worked I thought it was user friendly and pretty intuitive. It received fairly light use for 4-6 weeks and then suddenly went to sleep and will now no longer turn on. The battery was fully charged at the time and additional charging does not help. I purchased an additional warranty, but it looks like I may have to contact the manufacturer according to other reviews. Had I known this would happen I probably would have held off buying a tablet or purchased an iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: Got this for Christmas and it has been performing great so far.  Battery last a long time, apps load quick, lots of power for a low price (caught mine for $120), well worth the price I paid for a mid-tier tablet to mess around with.

Reviews.Title: I like this tablet
Reviews.Author: Ronny B.
Reviews.Content: It is much faster than my 8 inch tablet I have from Vizio, but I think it is only a single core processor where this one is a quad-core.  I bought a winshield mount for it and I use it with Co-Pilot for my GPS and for playing my MP3s, at the same time.  I have 1995 Pontaic Trans Am that has a OEM cassette player, but with and Aux Jack added so this plugs right into it with an double 1/8" stereo phone jack.  I also use it to play games and view pictures and videos from my Canon camera.BTW the mount I bought was from Amazon also the "Jarv High Grade Windshield Swivel Suction Car Mount for Google Nexus 7 / Apple Ipad Mini, Ipad Mini 2 / Galaxy Tab 2 , Tab 3 and All 7 Inch Tablets" and it works get with this tablet for me.

Reviews.Title: ASUS  Memo Pad HD 7 in.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it. I researched tablets for about 2 weeks then decided on this one. 16 GB Quadcore. I got the 7 inch one for the convenience of mobility ( it fits in cargo pants pocket,and in my inside jacket pockets). I have talked others into getting one also. This I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy it again
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Great device, runs smoothly, and handles what I need for personal or business use. Great battery life and great screen resolution.  Really needed a matte finish screen protector and is sadly a very skinny tablet compared to other 7" tablets. Super buy for the price!!!!

Reviews.Title: Surprising!
Reviews.Author: Billo
Reviews.Content: It was indeed surprising. My wife has wanted a small tablet for over a year so we followed the recommendation of a friend. We studied the reviews and this model scored higher than most. It was a good fit for her needs. She uses it for her email, some web browsing and viewing movies and videos anywhere in the house. She's extremely pleased. Color is great, sound is more than adequate and battery life is good. She's recommended it to three of her friends and one has already purchased one. Wish it came with some cheapo basic case but for the price it was a real bargain. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMO Pad HD 7-INch GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The first ASUS MeMO Pad HD 7-INch GB Tablet I ordered gave me problems. The movement on the screen was slow; the on/off button didn't function well. Finally the screen blacked out in less than a week. We returned it to Amazon and a replacement was received in about 10 days. The new ASUS MeMO is working well. I hope it continues to function properly. I have read reveiws where people have purchased this tablet during the same time period I ordered mine.  They also had similar issues. It makes me wonder if there was a "bad batch' during the manufacturing process.I bought a black TransCover that is very nice (for a reasonable price) that makes the tablet look and feel like a premium tablet. It puts the device into sleep mode when closed and the device wakes up when opened.I have given this device 4 stars since there were issues with the initial tablet. If the replacement tablet continues to function properly then the rating would increase to 5 stars. The price also made this a good value.

Reviews.Title: Asus
Reviews.Author: Jose Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Tablet was shut down and not want to load, what should I do to make it work again ? Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Works well my three year old loves it
Reviews.Author: Jenna Smith
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old received this for Christmas and loves it. She watches movies on netflix and plays games. Looks nice and runs well so far.

Reviews.Title: Asus memo pad
Reviews.Author: Misty Delcambre
Reviews.Content: Ordered one for my daughter for Christmas a few months ahead of time. I guess maybe I should have tested it beforehand because it wouldn't even power on on Christmas morning. I called Amazon on Christmas morning, not expecting anyone to answer, but they did and immediately shipped out a replacement. We received it two days later and it works perfectly. My daughter absolutely loves it. Thank you Amazon for your top notch service :-)

Reviews.Title: My Tech-Challenged Wife Loves This Smaller, Lighter Tablet
Reviews.Author: illumin8r "Rick"
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased a 10"+ ASUS tablet, but she used it very little, complaining that it was too big and too heavy to hold comfortably. I have purchased other ASUS products previously and have been very satisfied with the build and operating system implementation and proprietary "skins" in the past, so decided to stick with the brand. She now uses the tablet considerably more than she did the previous one. I'm very happy that I stayed with ASUS. A friend bought his wife a 7" NEXTbook which failed in a very short time and they found the service was poor to non-existent.

Reviews.Title: Great little droid device
Reviews.Author: Momofsteel
Reviews.Content: Wonderful tablet.  Well priced.  Works great for work and play.  Sound is decent.  The blue is a dark metallic blue - very different.

Reviews.Title: impressive well worth the money
Reviews.Author: joe "Joe Simmons"
Reviews.Content: EXTREMELY SATISFIED WITH THIS TABLET, ASUS has put together one hell of an entry level tablet.  Bought one for me and my girlfriend, two very satisfied customers

Reviews.Title: Incredible buy.
Reviews.Author: Lori Hockin
Reviews.Content: I really did my research on this and what a great tablet. Excellent processor, plenty off ram, plenty of space, and also an expansion slot for a microSD card. Another great thing is the price. I really looked at other places and other tablets and for the money it is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: A summary of this review is basically this: I have not experienced any of the problems in the negative reviews here on amazon.I was thinking about getting the 2013 nexus 7 but the price was too high for what I was wanting to use this - I knew this will be taking a beating. So I thought of the 2012 nexus 7.This Asus Memo Pad HD 7 has similar specs but weighs around 50g less probably because of the screen not being gorilla glass.I can't compare it to much else because this is my first tablet, but I do like it. I'm a big Android fan and this hasn't let me down.I like the size, weight, screen, software ... It's just a little thick, and I probably only notice that because of playing with the 2013 nexus 7 in the shops.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Touchscreen/Bluetooth Fan"
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful tablet and for the price paid, $129.99, you can't go wrong!!!Trusted brand and can be easily rooted.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gary Patton
Reviews.Content: My first tablet and getting to know it is fun. It fits the hand well and isn't heavy. Right now it is worth 5 stars for me. It is what I expected

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Sonja Capell
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet 3 months ago and it is wonderful!  No problems, no complaints!  Will buy this brand again!

Reviews.Title: Great price and works well!
Reviews.Author: Amanda N. Grell
Reviews.Content: We ordered this as a replacement for another tablet that we had gotten for my 8 year old daughter for Christmas. The original tablet was a Latte Ice Quad-Core 7" tablet and it ceased to work after one week of light use. However, we thought this would be a nice upgrade to that with a good reputation. My daughter loves it! Not only is it a bright pink which makes her feel pretty special in comparison to her older brother's Samsung Galaxy tab (white), but it is the perfect mix of style and function. She originally wanted an Ipad Mini but after receiving this tablet, she has not made a peep about any other tablets. The cameras work well and give good images which was an important thing for her. The screen has good resolution and everything works well with a light touch. She spends her time on the tablet using various game apps and youtube. I have to say after our first experience ordering the Latte tablet, this tablet has been a real treat!

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: swapiney
Reviews.Content: The plastic back worried me but so far so good! Very happy with my memopad. I did extensive research and found this was the best tab for the money! :-)

Reviews.Title: great overall
Reviews.Author: Leonie Wallace
Reviews.Content: So far has been good with all games my son has played, seems fast no freezes or glitches great to read books and comics really vivid colors overall very satisfied and would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Works well for almost everything
Reviews.Author: Colin
Reviews.Content: Our first tablet, and happy to have it as an addition to our XP netbook, Win7 laptop and Android phone. Have only used the tablet on home wi-fi but it is very responsive and the display is much sharper  and richer than the older netbook and phone. I would give it 5 stars but the lack of flash capability on Android s/w, means that I am unable to watch all the a/v (on news or sport sites for example) that I can with the WinOS devices. Secondly I had a scare when it appeared to die on me, when the battery ran down, however by charging it every evening, I haven't had this happen again.I would buy ASUS again.

Reviews.Title: I  am happy with my table ASUS MeMoPad
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my board I think I made a good buy because it appropriate to my limited this new technology knowledge, and what I like is that the battery saving is wonderful, good screen size and I can watch my favorite channels, and my email, Facebook and many more besides, I'm very happy with my purchase I recommend the seller as I arrived in the estimated time and highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: michelle kar
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet worth the price. It's just like my phone only bigger, great battery life, great to take on the go!!Would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: EYEz
Reviews.Content: Pros-small perfect size-clear image-durable-battery life-user friendlyCons- you lose sense of time-when someone talks to you you never hear what they say because you are to into your new tabletThis is my first tablet and i bought one around October of 2013 and my brother wanted one to so i got him one for the holidays its great for checking emails and surfing the internet/typing up documents on the fly. you need a wifi connection so you can't bring it everywhere but i bought a 32gb SDcard that i have a bunch of music and movies so its perfect for traveling. the color selection is kind of lame but get a good cover and you are set. Its a very bright screen. You get glares from time to time when there is a lot of light in the room so get a MATTE screen protector not a CLEAR and your problem is solved. It has so many features i usually end up finding new ones everyday. i only play slow casual games so i don't no about how good it runs with all the fancy games. Movies look really good on this and it can fit in the back of your jeans if you don't feel like carrying it around. Books on this are great perfect for the bookworm or college student plus most books are a lot cheaper when they are digital!If your into Graphic novels this is very good to the picture color is great overall a must buy for the cheaper but not rip off cheap. Delivery was perfect so no problems there.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: GH "Ross"
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it and I sneak it away and play with it too.  We know nothing about tablets but the long lasting battery lets us mess with it to learn as we go.  Great looking and pretty darn good speakers too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tablet for the price...has very nice battery life and runs very smoothly which was my main concern in buying a tablet.....Love it so much!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Rebekah
Reviews.Content: I haven't found anything yet that i dont like about this.  I bought it for my husband, and it even has some things i can do on my ipad! We really like it and its a great size.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Prazdncer
Reviews.Content: I love the it.... far better than I expected.  It is the perfect size and easy to carry through out my busy day.

Reviews.Title: Slowly died but great while it lasted
Reviews.Author: K. S. Laughey
Reviews.Content: Something was wrong from the moment we opened it. The battery never lasted long and eventually it stopped charging and then switched off forever after 12 days.While it lasted my son loved it - hassled me until I filled it full of games, discovered BBC iPlayer and could email and skype the family from the other side of the room just like a real grown up.ASUS however don't have a worldwide warranty service unlike most manufacturers so I will not be buying another thing made by ASUS again as a result.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Riyuki
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a tablet for several months, as I wanted to give the idea to my wife as a Christmas present.  When I read the specs on this tablet, it seemed almost too good to be true.I recieved the tablet as a present, and here are my impressions.The tablet is very well built.  It has a nice heft to it, but is not too heavy.  The only complaint I have with the tablet is the screen.  It is a hard plastic rather than the "GorillaGlass" that I have seen some of the more expensive tablets advertising.  However, I have not had any issues with the screen.The sensitivity of the screen is excellent, although it doesn't seem to like styluses nearly as much as it likes fingers.  I also purchased a Cross Tech2 pen/stylus combo, and the stylus functionality is hit/miss probably 30% of the time.  This happens with a Targus stylus as well, so I don't think it is limited to the Cross pen.The tablet is POWERFUL.  I was shocked to find a tablet with a quad-core processor, 16gb of built in memory, AND a microSD card slot for under $250.  I was even happier to find one for under $150!  I have tried quite a few games on this tablet, and although I am not truly a tablet gamer (I stick to slot games and the occasional Candy Crush Saga), it has performed admirably.  I am however, working on my tablet on a very regular basis (daily).  The tablet is unbelievably nice to carry to jobsites.I had no troubles updating this tablet, although I purchased a white one for my wife, and she encountered an issue with a firmware update that improved the performance of NetFlix.  She is not too worried about it, as she does not watch netflix on the device.  Installation of apps, including the Amazon Appstore was painless.I have installed a 32gb microSD card, and have loaded several digital movies onto the system.  Playback is gorgeous in HD, although the sound only comes from one side when one is holding the tablet in a landscape orientation.  My suggestion, get a nice set of earbuds.All in all, an insanely featured tablet for an unbelievable price.  I have recommended this tablet to QUITE a few friends, and so far, none have been unhappy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, works great
Reviews.Author: Anson M.
Reviews.Content: Great screen Quality, functions smoothly without any hangups, good solid build quality to it. A great buy, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: Z. K. Goulamgookhan
Reviews.Content: I was very much surprised when I received it. I was expecting a much lower quality for that price.Pros:The finish is really nice - no sharp edges. The high gloss back finish looks awesome (although a little too glossy for my taste).I was very impressed with its battery life. I don't have a hi-end tablet to compare with. But for this price range, I think this is one of the best.I didn't get any wireless connectivity issues so far. In fact, it works flawlessly and quite fast up to now.The camera works fine and can take average to good quality pictures in daylight or fully lit environment.Power and volume buttons are activated with right amount of pressure.I had the impression that a 7-inch tablet would be too small for me, but it just doesn't feel that way when holding and using it.The Asus apps are actually very useful.I've already installed like 20 apps and they all work perfectly without any issues.Cons:Glossy back is prone to smudgeSome lags when swiping through screens and screen rotationsCamera could be betterI don't know if this will be the case in the future, but I wish it gets updated to android 4.3I'd definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a tablet for this price range.

Reviews.Title: Good quality midrange tablet
Reviews.Author: Busy mom
Reviews.Content: No troubles so far with this tablet. Everything about it is mid-range. The battery life is good. It plays HD movies fine. It is built nicely.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gracie Totman
Reviews.Content: This reader is a good value. It does everything one might want in tablet. However the on/off button is very finicky.

Reviews.Title: The best gift i ever got
Reviews.Author: lordson
Reviews.Content: I bought this as my christmas present and its the best christmas present and my best companion i mean there is nothing i cant do with it. It is a great deal for the money

Reviews.Title: Bought several
Reviews.Author: Mike Brooks "Tech & Media Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: They are good tablets for the price.  They are not an iPad replacement. They aren't even a Kindle replacement.  However, if you want to get your child one, these are perfect for that. They are also perfect for running non-taxing apps. I believe you have to update the software to be able to run nextflix too. At least I had to do so.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with this tablet.  Great price.
Reviews.Author: Wyoming Eagle
Reviews.Content: I had never owned or used a tablet before.  I only needed it for a few things due to the wireless capability, so I did not want to spend a great deal.  This tablet was the best price I found for the overall quality and features.  The screen display is very good.  The solidness, which was mentioned in some reviews as not as good as ipads, seems quite good to me.  I didn't use the tablet before I put a screen cover on it, so I don't have a response about the fingerprint issue mentioned.  I've had it for about a month and am glad I bought it.  I didn't give it five stars because I have yet to "love" an electronic device.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Rob Romero "texas4rob"
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great tablet at a great price. The Cameras work great as this was one of the reasons that I purchased it.( 2 cameras ). It has no problems running any games and it keeps my kids off of my tablet! They were always on mine since I bought them a low budget tablet last year. Never again!! I also have other Asus tablets in the house that work great

Reviews.Title: a great value for the price
Reviews.Author: D. MacQueen "Dave M."
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to replace her first edition  ipad. she was delighted with the performance and ease of use. She particularly enjoyed the voice activated browser search , which retrieved what she was looking for every time. We have had the tablet for two months now and, so far, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet.
Reviews.Author: Colin "cwood5"
Reviews.Content: Very fast and responsive.  For the price it is as good as any mid level tablet.  Plus it has a nice camera on both the front and back.

Reviews.Title: Asus MeMOPad HD 7-inch
Reviews.Author: Dale Rose
Reviews.Content: Yes did very well. But still does not have gaming attachments like the Nexus, so my son still takes my Nexus and is not charged when I need it.

Reviews.Title: Had to reset the device one already
Reviews.Author: Mainsil
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet, I would give it five stars but it had a pretty big problem.  My son had this for a month and it suddenly stopped communicating with the internet, even though Wifi Connection was solid, and it was cleared through the router.  Tried the on-off, off battery out, reset the WiFi, went through all the configuration settings, etc.Finally gave up and reset the machine back to factory settings.  I was able to get it connected to the internet again, but my son had to re-download all his apps.

Reviews.Title: great buy at a great price
Reviews.Author: cubao boy
Reviews.Content: Consumer's report recommended this model. so far so good. can stand toe-to-toe with galaxy tab 3. what's more, it has 16 gb - double that of other competing brands.

Reviews.Title: Our Grandson LOVES this!
Reviews.Author: C. L. Hornung "new grandma"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a Christmas gift for our 10-year old grandson (it was on his Santa list). He jumped so high when he opened it and I am sure that he loves his tablet!  This is enough storage for a kid and has many apps on it!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet and my son loves it on all hockey road trips!
Reviews.Author: Robert Whited
Reviews.Content: Does everything a young boy  would want.  Great peace of mind as its cost was low, but quality is great.

Reviews.Title: awesome fast tablet
Reviews.Author: liz
Reviews.Content: got this tablet for my son and it is lightning fast. my husband compares it with his samsung and was very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael Manausa "wmanausa"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet for my son without spending a lot. LOVE this it does everything my iPad does! Easy to use. Tons of apps so pleased.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with this tablet
Reviews.Author: PaulR
Reviews.Content: Bought this having looks at lots of other tablet specifications, didn't want to spend a lot of money on another device so went with this one, delighted, does exactly what I need - as a caused device for emailing, skyping, viewing, recording, etc etc. All round I am very happy:-)

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: limegreenautumn
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. It feels like I'm on my phone only bigger. I dislike the shade of green, it looks more like yellow.

Reviews.Title: love it, it never gets put down
Reviews.Author: jent
Reviews.Content: This received five stars because it does everything it is suppose to do.  I bought this for my husband that plays games alot.  The picture Is a great quality, the screen is very responsive, it has lots of memory so very fast.  Great product

Reviews.Title: Asus Memo Pad
Reviews.Author: Jane Reader
Reviews.Content: I love the Memo Pad but was torn between it and the Kindle HD. I cannot stream Amazon prime videos on the Memo Pad; however, the camera and price point were worth the trade off.

Reviews.Title: Pound for pound best tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Nas 1/2 Man-1/2 Amazing
Reviews.Content: This ASuS MeMo HD 7 is my first tablet so take this review as me being a noob about tablets but I am NOT a noob about technology in general. I was shopping for a tablet that was around 150.00 which is cheap but didn’t want a CHEAP product and I think this has been accomplished. The performance is pretty good and while it may not play the best games at the best performance (which I was not looking to do anyway) it will play some games and play them well. The screen is nice to look at and the colors pops out at you. The hardware is plastic but meh I have a case for the device so I rarely see it. I am not worry about screen fingerprints or anything because I have a screen protector I use which works well. The battery life is real...I played with the tablet when I first got it pretty strongly for 6 and 1/2 hours (including several games for long periods of time) and I still had 35% battery left....so I am sure it would have made the 10 hours it claims which is excellent. My battery times thereafter have been right about the same doing about the same load on the battery. Good job!I think what this tablet accomplishes is for 1st time or novice users getting them a tablet that they can start from to decide if this would be something good for use by the children or something you can use for yourself without breaking the bank while still getting a quality tablet and that's important. I did a lot of checking into the tablet before buying it and the reviews have been spot on with what I should expect which made me take the leap, well that and getting a lot of Amazon gift cards as gifts recently which made the thing close to free *grin* but I still would have paid the 139.00 for it regardless.I have had other ASuS products in the past for my personal computer builds and such and they have never let me down and neither has this tablet. I think it's well worth the money with good performance, good quality and don’t forget about that lovely SD Slot! Cheap tablet but not a cheap product. Nuff said!

Reviews.Title: My search is over!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Catrine
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome tablet at a great price. This was the third tablet (different brands) I purchased as a Christmas gift to my 9 yr. old son. He took over my Ipad and I wanted to get him a cheaper tablet to use. I am so impressed with everything about this. Thank you for all the feedback. I ordered this based on all the positive reviews. All that was said about it is true. I may keep this for myself and let him keep the ipad mini. lol! You cannot go wrong with the ASUS MeMOpad. Amazon is great at returning if you are unhappy but, you wont be.I just use it for surfing the web, facebook, stupid zombies & candy crush games, videos and photos. Nothing too fancy. Its all good.Update The charger stopped working and it looked like it was a "used or defected"  charger. Amazon was great about shipping a whole new tablet. I am still happy with this except, I cannot use amazon prime.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: dale sweigart
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 4 year old son for xmas. For a cheaper tablet I think it works very well. The setup is easy and the android platform is nice since I use a Galaxy S4 phone and the kids are used to thats.Battery life is very good, screen is still responsive with the screen protector on and the processor is pretty quick. It's no ipad but for the price it's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Ryan
Reviews.Content: I use this for youtube and email mainly.  It works great.  If you have a droid phone it's very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: great asus tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: at this price, you cannot go wrong.its fast and responsive.smoothe to the touch. don't wait and go buy now! thank you

Reviews.Title: We love Asus !
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Best tablets on the market. No sense spending more and getting less! These tablets work great and are well built.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7's Sister Is Ok
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I thought I would write a review to get an answer to a question.Bought two of these tablets for my kids.I ordered navy for my son which looked more like black than navy.Pink for my daughter was nice.I don't have any problems with the plastic back cover.The pink looks much better than the navy.And I chose the colors not because of what one reviewer said about the concept of why they came out with these colors ie, green is environmental etc.My kids favorite colors are pink and blue that's why I bought these colors.I won't add anymore to this except to ask "Where are the games?"Kids have ipod 4 and it was easy to install anything from games, tv channels like Disney.And everytime, you have to sign in for every single thing.It's so annoying and frustrating!Glad I didn't buy the Nexus 7 for myself even if it has more than a thousand reviews.I bought the Samsung Tab 8 and am very happy with it.With all the reviews the Nexus 7 has gotten I am sure I would have trouble with it just like this Asus tablet.Samsung tab is easy to use for first time tablet user like me.The only reason I have to like about this tablet is because it's bigger than the ipod.Again, where are the games?Without a manual you have to figure out things for yourself.I will probably edit this review as I go along.

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Lisa J. Bryan
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my teenage daughter.  She says she hasn't had any problems with it at all and it works just fine.  Can't be more specific since I'm not the primary user, but as long as she's happy with it, so am I!

Reviews.Title: I use it all the time!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Bullock
Reviews.Content: I use this tablet all the time! The 2nd layer apps are great and is so versatile for the price. It is pretty much a Nexus 7, just a tiny slower in speed, but not much for the tablet tech. Just be sure to invest in a case and screen protector. Works great for evernote and quick photos as well!

Reviews.Title: Love it 100%
Reviews.Author: Rebecca DiNapoli
Reviews.Content: Love it, Love it, Love it!!! It is better than I expected and my kids love it more than the ipad!

Reviews.Title: ASUs Memopad
Reviews.Author: Ann Schlosser
Reviews.Content: Great price.  The quality of the product is outstanding.  Easy to use and screen quality is great.Granddaughter hasn't set it down since Xmas

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Kim Ingram
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've owned, but I am pleased so far.  I like the clarity of the screen and the speakers work well.  I read the reviews on this and other products when trying to make a decision on what to buy.  This tablet has lived up to those positive posts.  I was looking for something in the under $200.00 range and this certainly fills my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great for school.
Reviews.Author: DAVID SHAPIRO
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter.  She was able to down load apps that helped her get her best grades! Dynamic screen.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Handmaiden to the breed"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift and the giftee has been so thrilled with this baby (said it was like a puppy, she couldn't put it down) that I ended up getting on for my sister and moi. Sister loves this also. I really like that I can carry it in my purse ( I own a Galaxy 2 10.1 ) This MeMo pad is just as clear almost as fast and simpler to use. Mine came with a screen protector on it (I didn't realize at the time). I added a sd card,  and got a pretty case for protection. Good to go. Battery life is fine (best to turn off GPS and turn on eco settings. The on off button has a different feel than the Galaxy tab so it took me a few minutes to turn it off. Reading the manual is a wise thing.All in all, a fine choice for the budget conscious. Got mine on a $129.00 sale

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Stettner
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old  granddaughter.  The graphics are great and she absolutely loves it!!!

Reviews.Title: mine mine,
Reviews.Author: Adellyne Ince-Saroop
Reviews.Content: oh so glad this is mine!! Purchased this to replace a cheap chinese version.Easy to use, apps already downloaded , battery pre charged!!!!Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: LiveLoveMyKids
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son.  He wanted one because I have the 10" one and it's awesome.  I couldn't spend almst $300 so this is the one we bought.  It does everything mine does.  I also bought 2 cheaper tablets for my younger kids.  They are being returned.  For an extra $40, they will be getting one of these instead.  Its the best out there for a 7" tablet and great price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Melgie
Reviews.Content: It is amazing! Love this item it is very easy to use . I plan to buy another one for my niece  a bday gift.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but no OTG feature
Reviews.Author: Steven M
Reviews.Content: Good tablet for its price but it does not support OTG feature.Battery life has been good for the 2 weeks I have been using it.A full charge  can last about 10 hours.The display is surprisely bright with good contrast.Its camera is only average as expected.

Reviews.Title: Great, except Netflix doesn't work on it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I researched inexpensive tablets, bought the newest Nexus 7  -- and found it frustrating and unresponsive, and returned it to the store.  Not so the Asus 7 HD, which I bought from Amazon at 2/3 the price of the Nexus 7, and which works well, easily, quickly.  I like it better than the Apple iPad I had formerly -- it is small, easy to hold, and it is easy to enlarge text.  Because it so easily retains sites visited in Google Chrome until I specifically choose to close them, it is a wonderful way to revisit pages I am not done with yet.I use it as a reader, finding it as good as the Kindle Paperwhite I bought when the iPad proved impossible to read books on (too much glare, too hard on the eyes).I listen to music on it, especially now that Spotify is available for Android.  The sound is thin, but works as an accompaniment to my reading or my browsing.What I don't like is Netflix -- which will not work on my Asus 7 HD.  I called Asus, and they were very helpful -- except that no matter how many times I reinstall Netflix, it doesn't work.  So watching movies is not possible -- though you can watch all sorts of YouTubes with no problem.So a great, easy, functional, very portable computer, which has problems with Netflix and has a battery which maybe doesn't last the 8-10 hours it is touted as lasting.  I do like it very much, and use it daily, so this is a very positive review.  Just, because of the Netflix glitch, not a rave.

Reviews.Title: great end around
Reviews.Author: razorback
Reviews.Content: i have a nexus 7 which is made by asus!! and also have 2 asus memo 7 hd's save the money and buy this!! no need to pay GOOGLE!! the memo has everything the nexus does! i put the nexus next to the memo hit same apps at the same time! asus was faster! screen resolution is less than the nexus but if your not an owl !! human eyes cannot even see the diff !! tried loading multiple tabs they both did good but asus was a little faster! way more clutter on the nexus!!

Reviews.Title: Great Utilitarian Tablet
Reviews.Author: C. GRANT
Reviews.Content: First off, let me make it clear that this machine is NOT competition against current-gen iPads. It has an HD screen, yes, and a quad-core processor. It's slim, easy to hold, and it has tremendous battery life. It does have a MicroSDHC slot, something that iPads do not. It does NOT have a very high-resolution camera (the rear camera is only 5MP). Its HD screen is NOT 1080p (or equivalent). It's capacitive screen is not nearly as sensitive as an iPad's. Still, this is a powerful little machine with just exactly what you'd need for handling daily business, keeping in touch with people, reading books via the Kindle app, or even doing moderate work. It's also CHEAP; at about $150, you'll be hard-pressed to find another quality tablet with all the same features. As a public school teacher, this machine is ideal for me, because it's powerful enough to handle the entire Google Drive suite, Kindle, and other utilities that I use in the classroom, while at the same time remaining cheap enough that I needn't fear the spills, falls and other potential damage that can come with working with kids (and in fact, it's pretty darn durable, and a cheap case makes it even more so). Ultimately, if you're looking for the latest-and-greatest, this is not the machine for you. But if you need something that's tough, utilitarian and reasonably priced, the MeMOPad HD 7 is absolutely ideal!

Reviews.Title: working good
Reviews.Author: sir
Reviews.Content: bought this for my 4 year old. down loads are fast. not to heavy. picture is nice. charges on micro usb not some weird plug. Best one out there for the money. looked at  a bunch.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: John D. Johnson "Random John"
Reviews.Content: It has enough power to read, surf, and play games. I bought a couple for my kids and they thoroughly enjoy then. Best part is they won't break the bank.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: TB
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great if you're looking for a nice tablet for your children.  I bought two for my kids and it does everything that they need with no issues so far. Netflix, games, emails, etc...they have no problems at all with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Very and Very good
Reviews.Author: Paulo Viiera
Reviews.Content: I'm so very glad with this tablet, this ASUS have a powerful processor, quad core !!! speed, sensitive display, fantastic sound system and a real HD definition, great memory capacity and perfect finish. The best option for buy a small tablet (7 inch) save money and play with a powerful equipment.Congratulations to ASUS, one more time...Have my all recomendation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the Android tablet of choice if you want a good up to date tablet that isn't too expensive. Setup was a breeze and unlike other tablets I own, I have never had to reset this one at all. It updated to a newer Android version almost immediately. And with 1gb ram and 16 gb on board, it holds a lot of apps. It also came with 16gb web storage from Asus and I installed a 32gb Micro sd card that I just use for backup.

Reviews.Title: need instructions for this tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Trolia
Reviews.Content: Not enough information to compare other tablets with  My granddaughter had it for one day and change everything and it took me two days to get most of it back. She now has one of her own.

Reviews.Title: awesome fit
Reviews.Author: wayne hogan
Reviews.Content: This case fits like a glove.  It does not blick cameras or power or volume buttons.  It takes a little adjustment to use the power and volume buttons but aftwr a short time uou will be comfortable with the feel

Reviews.Title: Asus MeMOPad HD  7 (ME173X-A1-BL)
Reviews.Author: Ham Op
Reviews.Content: This is the forth tablet I have purchased in two years and it's a keeper! From the start. it practically sets itself up after initial turn on.Before using, charge the battery 12 hours. My battery did not need another charge for almost three weeks. My older tablets were good for maybe 3 to 4 hours on a charge. This is the first tablet that I have owned that runs Echo-Link and other ham radio apps correctly. Google Play works well and is a huge improvement over Get Jar that older tablets came with. The screen is crisp and bright  and has a very good viewing angle. The audio is a huge improvement over earlier tablets. The thing that I found missing is the HDMI connector. I normally won't use it but it would be nice to have the option.  I showed it to a friend and he bought one as a gift for his wife. They have had equally good results with initial setup. This is her first tablet

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: everto
Reviews.Content: I like a lot this ítem,  but i didn't know that this tablet don't play avi files, it has a nice resolution, and the processor is fast

Reviews.Title: Value for the money
Reviews.Author: I. D. Mpelouris "yannis"
Reviews.Content: Excellent value  for money.  Good screen,  responsive and trouble free operation. The operating system is close  to vanilla  Android, so that is a big plus  too.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Devlin
Reviews.Content: I recently had my Toshiba Thrive 7 die due to no fault of it's own.. it was a fantastic tablet that I used for everything!Being I had been out of work for 10 months and just started working again I purchased one of these Asus MeMO Pad HD 7 ( an ME173 model) it is great so far! The only reason it misses a star is the screen feels like plastic which I must assume will scratch much easier. Seriously that is it! For the price it is one great tablet with just a cheap screen and the back feels like cheap plastic (with case and screen protector this will be irrelevant just additional cost).  It is an Asus product so I place a lot of faith in it. They have an awesome name as the premier electronics manufacturers. I've purchased their motherboards for years for their quality, they also are the manufacturer for such famous tablets as the Kindle Fire line and the Google Nexus line of tablets!  Yeah, they are no stranger to quality and those companies know it!My wife and I place such faith in the brand we purchased two one for each of us this year. It costs half what I paid for my Toshiba and hardware wise it gives it a run for it's money the feel of it and difference of glass vs. plastic screen are the only place I feel there is a quality difference... so I spent 30 on a nice Asus brand case and 8 bux on screen protectors that were well recommended.If you get it 150 or less you got a nice tablet for a very reasonable price... use a screen protector and it makes it nicer than the Nexus of the same storage class!

Reviews.Title: Wow, a screen protector that work
Reviews.Author: marlon campbell
Reviews.Content: This item works well with my Asus tablet. My wife placed it on with ease. It is easy to clean, thus far I have seen no scratches on it and it does not reduce the screens sensitivity. I really think this is worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: Good for what it's for.
Reviews.Author: Sophie Julien
Reviews.Content: Pros: Does everything a reasonable tablet shouldCons: Low battery life, no 3gIf you need a tablet that does what you need it to, but don't mind charging it and not having internet on the go, this is for you.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: Jaydee Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: Asus memo pad is a great little tablet. I used it on vacation and it was very easy to travel with, it's very light and does so much.  It's a lot of bang for the buck

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a low price.
Reviews.Author: Jer
Reviews.Content: Very fast tablet.  My 11 year old son is impressed and happy with his Christmas present.  No complaints or problems.  Asus has updated the firmware twice since I purchased in November.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Donna Lynne Thomas
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old Granddaughter. She loves it. I am technically challenged but she has already figured out how to do all the things she was doing on the old Kindle she had plus she loves the voice commands.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: L. Foster
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews on a number of different tablets.  I have a laptop but wanted something to use with more ease and a tablet that took good pics as well.  This tablet more than exceeds my expectations.  The dual camera is great.  I get a much larger view of the pic I took compared to my digital camera.  The quality is great.  The navigation is easy.  I have read a number of books as well.  A Kindle app. is already installed on the device.The keyboard is easy to use without errors in touching other keys.I have downloaded a few free games and have found them to be very entertaining too.Overall, this tablet is great for the price and I would highly recommend to anyone if you are looking for the same kind of functions.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jamk
Reviews.Content: Whats there not to like about this tablet. Nice feel to it, works great and comes at a great price.recommends it to everyone

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat for the money
Reviews.Author: PPD1607
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter.  She has been using almost constantly for several days with no problems.  It is not as high powered as a higher end tablet but you should not expect it to be a powerhouse.  Very slight pause almost not noticeable.  The power button is on the bottom side of the tablet making it slightly awkward in a case, but only a minor issue.  Will update if anything changes.

Reviews.Title: perfect tablet for young kids
Reviews.Author: mspice
Reviews.Content: the screen is great. The performance is great. It's bigger than the Nexus 7 but it's so much cheaper is worth it and kids don't care about that

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for Christmwas and so far it is working well for her.  Great sceen and runs fast so far.  Needs a better owners manual though.  She gets a little frustrated trying to learn how everything works.  Got on line and down loaded her a more complete manual for her.  Seems to be a very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: A nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Since we just got the tablet and have really not had a chance to put it to task, I can only go by appearance.  Has a nice clear picture, is light weight and does everything a larger tablet does but in a more convenient to carry size.

Reviews.Title: good tablet, keep dying every now and then
Reviews.Author: Shyam Kumar
Reviews.Content: I bought this in Oct 2013 and till a few weeks back, it was working great and I was very happy with the tablet. Then a few weeks back, it just wouldn't power up. I left it charging overnight still it wouldn't come up. I left it for dead and was going to call ASUS. Just before calling I tried one more time to power up where it came up showing the battery needs charging. After charging it came up and worked fine!!!Exact same thing happened again last week. It wouldn't power up - charged it for a couple of hours which didn't help - left it for 2 days - tried again to power up where it showed that it needs charging - charged it and it came back to life.I think there is a problem with either battery or charger. Since I have a work around, I am going to keep it. I don't want to send it to factory with all my email unprotected.  Gave 3 starts because I like the tablet , in spite of the battery issue. In future, however, I will be careful buying ASUS products.

Reviews.Title: All my expectations fullfilled and more
Reviews.Author: JuanB
Reviews.Content: Excellent craftmanship, nice screen and good features. Has a really good performance, nice price value ratio dont pay more for any other tablet you can get all you need with this one!

Reviews.Title: good little tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothy K Souza
Reviews.Content: sometimes it locks up and doesnt come back on, so you have to hold the power button for 15 seconds or so.

Reviews.Title: It was good for a moment
Reviews.Author: Ronald Johnson
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet but it stop working two months after I got it and I can not get it working again I call the company for help but got no where so I am a little disappointed with this purchase

Reviews.Title: INEXPENSIVE!
Reviews.Author: IamSmith
Reviews.Content: Not Cheap! We weren't sure we wanted a tablet so we tried this Asus. It's pretty slick and paired to a bluetooth keyboard and bluetooth mouse it's very handy in front of the TV. So far we like it!

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad HD7
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet.  My wife has a 10" ASUS Tablet, and I like this 7" better, as it is more portable.  I have had this tablet now several months, and I have no complaints at all.  I have downloaded apps and everything works really well.  I use this tablet for reading (Kindle app), Facebook, Email, controlling my Canon Camera.  Many, many uses.The battery lasts all day.  This was well worth the $150 that I paid for it!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet for all ages.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The Asus Memopad is easy to use, responsive, light, and an overall great tablet for day-to-day tasksI chose this product because it had received the best overall rating, and I couldn't have made a better choice. It's inexpensive, and does everything it's supposed to.I purchased 3 of these, 2 to give away, and 1 for myself. I'm pretty sure that the people who'll receive the tablets will switch out their laptops, since it does everything a laptop does, except faster and easier.The HD screen is crystal clear, and since it's a smaller screen, the resolution is more than enough. The touchscreen is responsive, and you don't have to press hard at all. The speaker is as good as it gets on a device like this.The battery life is like advertised, it lasted an entire day of medium use, playing games, browsing the web, watching youtube videos, etc.If you're tired of carrying around a heavy laptop to browse the internet, watch youtube videos, pay the bills, etc, just get one of these and maybe a bluetooth keyboard to accompany it.

Reviews.Title: All I needed
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The ASUS MeMOPad HD 7-Inch is my first tablet and Android device. Being a Mac user, an iPad Mini would've be my first choice, but financial realities and what I had planned to use a tablet for made the MeMOPad the reasonable way to go. My requirements are very basic - mostly general online activities, email, viewing photos and the occasional video. Not a gamer, so the fairly modest processor of the MeMOPad has been more than up to the task, as has the 720p HD display. Battery life was only OK until I figured out to turn the GPS module off and now it's much improved. Also nice to have the MicroSD slot, something missing on many higher-end tablets, especially for photo files. Immediately popped in a 32GB card so there's plenty of storage. The only real issue I've had is the occasional dismounting of the MicroSD card. Doesn't happen enough to be a big bother though. Some "professional" reviewers complained about the MeMOPad's plastic construction and fit & finish, but keeping in mind that it's not a premium priced tablet, I don't find it off-putting at all. I'd prefer that to cheaping out on the display (hello HP), processor or internal storage. Besides, mine is living in a (rooCASE) cover pretty much all of the time anyway. So far I'm thoroughly happy with this modestly priced tablet.

Reviews.Title: My first Tablet
Reviews.Author: ian
Reviews.Content: This was the first tablet I've ever bought and it's fantastic. I really like it. Might not be the best and fastest out there but for me it's probably a little overkill. I really just wanted something to do some basic surfing with and this does that plus a ton more. Plays games very well and the sound and video quality are awesome! Plus it's quad core and the screen quality is better than some more expensive tablets. Already recommended this tablet to a friend, would recommend to anyone on a budget who's looking for the best in the $150 or under range. The only complaint I have with it is that no helpful manual was included, just a small booklet showing how to charge it properly. So learning all the settings and such are completely on the user to figure out. Thankfully however, it's relatively easy to figure it all out. All in all, very happy with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great value media viewer.
Reviews.Author: Jake Lewis
Reviews.Content: Coupled with a 64GB SD card this makes a very capable media viewer - a good screen and plenty of cheap storage.I used this SD card  B009QZH6JSformatted using  [...]The plastic back scratches really easily, but I use a case anyway.An HDMI output (like the similarly priced Hisense Sero 7 Pro) would have been really nice :(

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: OmSachdev
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it.for $130 price it is a great value for money and I dont see a need for spending 500-600$.

Reviews.Title: THIS TABLET IS AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: monty l.
Reviews.Content: Great value, great quality, this thing is amazing. It far exceeded my expectations. I couldnt have asked for a better tablet for my daughter for Christmas, especially at this price point. The clarity of the hd screen is really nice. I love this thing and will be buying another to have around the house.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: atgreene
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price. Very responsive. Looks great and has very nice screen resolution. Again great for the price. Bought for chritmas present for my two boys and I have personally tried it and it works really good.

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: wenjie c.
Reviews.Content: very easy to using! very good performance compere the price. but the size is too small if you use it for reading.

Reviews.Title: too ... good
Reviews.Author: Raghavendra
