I cannot find it on this one, it is NOT listed under the "Settings:Device" menu like the others.This is ridiculous.At a glance (Day 1), the tablet is very fast, seems to be plenty refined and feels good in the hand. No complaints about the build or quality so far, but I will not rate this any higher than 3 stars until they fix this lack of multi-user function, or until I find it buried somewhere in the settings menu in a place that no other device seems to have it.[EDIT]Despite attempting to get the pad to do software updates to get to using Android 4.2.2 yesterday (and being told every time that I was up to date), it decided to update today to 4.2.2. This DOES give me the multi-user function, but it's very buggy.On my secondary  user account, apps often seem to freeze unless you switch from one app to the other using the floating app key. If you momentarily leave an app, and return, it will be running fine again and complete whatever command you gave it that froze it. Doesnt' always happen, and doesn't happen on every app.Either way, at least the multi-user function is working.I have had no other issues with the tablet, and for now I will consider these to be minor bugs that will be worked out.MARCH 2014So far this tablet has been pretty good, but we've simply abandoned the multi-user setting now. Just too buggy. Other than this, the tablet works great. Good battery life, quick processor.

Reviews.Title: Great 7" Pad..  I Love It...
Reviews.Author: Chuckhere
Reviews.Content: The Quad Core is as fast as the Nexus 7, and I love the pic's, that the 5 magapixel camera takes, which Nexus 7 does not have. (at the old-one, did not have).  WiFi works Great ! ! !

Reviews.Title: Quality tablet at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Guglielmo "Matt"
Reviews.Content: This tablet (while nowhere near a Galaxy Tab) is a very, very decent tablet for $150... I would actually say I got way more than I paid for. There is no lag, boot times are about 15 seconds, and the Android OS is sprinkled with only very light and descreet ASUS application (of which I do use a few, the calendar in particular, syncs with your google calendar and has a very nice GUI). And the Asus transcover for it (while its a little pricey) is a GREAT case, its unobtrusive and it turns off the screen when you close the flap.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Edwar
Reviews.Content: Good product I like. It is useful and cheap relative to their performance apliamente not recommend it okey, fine very happy

Reviews.Title: Very Unlucky
Reviews.Author: Xanarch
Reviews.Content: I have had 2 tablets now go completely dead and are unable to be turned on. I leave them on the included charger over night and get no response. I tried all of the little tricks to get it to hard boot or just get a response out of it. When it worked it worked well. I just want a working reliable tablet and I thought I was going to have that with Asus but they have disappointed me this time.

Reviews.Title: The Most under rated tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mark Mason
Reviews.Content: very good build quality. fast and smooth. light weight.the price is lower than the Nexus 7 1st gen.Having the SD slot is great for expanding memory.I had the old Memopad and the viewing angles where bad. This HDversion a much nicer screen. Definitely Worth the upgrade.

Reviews.Title: this was worth the investment
Reviews.Author: Peta-Gaye McEwan
Reviews.Content: This was my first tablet, it is very convenient and works well. I had some overheating issues and was advised by Asus support team to wipe the tablet, since then I haven't had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: K. R. Perkins
Reviews.Content: I have a 10.1 inch Asus Transformer and I call this one my "Mini Asus".  Has a beautiful screen as does my larger one.  I do wish it could open up in the Landscape mode like the larger one.  Depending on the app, it is fine turning to landscape.  No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: rohina
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this tablet for my daughter who is 12 years old.  She uses it for school, church and personal use.  The speakers are pretty loud.  It seems user-friendly.  It's been only a month or so and no problem of anything as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Yamile Garcia-Cerra
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything I expected it to, and when compared to other devices out there, you can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Five star for now
Reviews.Author: Roger M
Reviews.Content: Price, value, speed, resolution, all good.I have installed a screen protector (TechArmor)and it still responds well to touch.I have a 16 gb micro sd installed.Nice tablet.

Reviews.Title: Died
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cheng
Reviews.Content: Bought it on Sep 5, delivered on Sep 7th.It was a good pad but a bit sensitive to swipe and caused something non-response clicks.While it worked, works ok.It died yesterday the 22nd, after put it on a known working charger for 10 hours, still cannot boot up.Not sure if I should contact Amazon or Asus.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price!
Reviews.Author: Praveen B
Reviews.Content: Tablet met my expectations, battery life is good and most apps worked fine.At times, I do notice the screen flicker, not sure if anyone had experienced it.

Reviews.Title: failed after five weeks, no return.
Reviews.Author: A. Marriott
Reviews.Content: This item stopped working; one week after my return window with Amazon, that is 30 days. The battery was low, I charged it, and it won't boot up. I lose my photos, my music, my books, my drawings, and Amazon says forget it. This is not what I expect from Amazon. This is the third android device that failed for me, the other two were purchases on ebay. I guess those two failed faster, so the ebay dealers didn't quibble about the return.  but Amazon? What?  I have to eat this 150$ purchase?Guess I will go with Apple from now on, and watch Amazon more closely.

Reviews.Title: My tablet died after 1 hour use.
Reviews.Author: ANDY ALFONSO RODRIGUEZ LOZADA
Reviews.Content: I just used my tablet 1 hour, then began a system update and never finished. Now I have a useless object and a headache.Yo sólo usé mi tableta 1 hora, luego comenzó una actualización del sistema y nunca terminó. ahora tengo un objeto inservible y un dolor de cabeza.

Reviews.Title: Huge Disappointment
Reviews.Author: D. Moores
Reviews.Content: This item never worked right. I was unable to connect to wi fi although all other items in my home have no problem. It claimed to have an SD card slot but when mine arrived it did not have one. I was very disappointed with this item and would not recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Arrived defective
Reviews.Author: sid vee "svicious22@yahoo.com"
Reviews.Content: Within weeks of receiving this product it stopped turning on.  The battery life was never good, a couple hours at most and the eventually it stopped working altogether.  When it was working, it was very slow in comparison with my iPad Mini.  Clearly there was something wrong with the particular one I purchased.

Reviews.Title: No external memory! Card not seated.
Reviews.Author: Larry Johnston
Reviews.Content: After reading all the negative comments I bought it anyway. Worked great for a bout a month. Sure enough the memory card is no longer recognized by the tablet. Can't get it to find the card. Stuck with the 16 MG. This was a low cost tablet to see if I wanted to upgrade at a later date. Other than the external memory issue it works. I will upgrade no doubt. Not with this manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: JC "James Brown"
Reviews.Content: A good tablet.battery life is great.no sound on skype or netflix. Crackle and huluplus  are fine. Skype sound works with earbuds. Other wise tablet is great.  Camera is excellent.i think it works better than galaxy tab 3.  I live in nicaragua and could not send it back. Google voice and magicjack work with no  problems. For  me, its great. I certainly reccomennd it. I gave it  two stars  because of skype  and netflix.

Reviews.Title: No Charger, bought new.. but it was used
Reviews.Author: Shar
Reviews.Content: Has no charger, I bought new and it was definitely not new.. Had photos and obvious use.  I think the no charger was the stickler.

Reviews.Title: Great performance, but the screen is like a mirror
Reviews.Author: K. Morgan "Denver_reader"
Reviews.Content: The super reflective screen was a deal killer for me. Every time I picked this up to use I couldn't help being distracted by the super reflective glass over the screen. It is a mirror. It reflects your face, the room behind you, etc. I don't know if other tablets have this problem but it was too annoying to keep.But then, after using it for about 2 hours total, on day 2 it just stopped working. So, I'll have to return it anyway. (I didn't buy it from Amazon).Also, as another reviewer pointed out, the Netflix ap won't display a picture. Sound plays, but the screen stays black. I did a search and discovered others are having this same problem.I was impressed by the speedy processor - if they'd replace the glass with a more matt surface I'd enjoy the Asus MoMOPad.

Reviews.Title: ASUS - SIGH!
Reviews.Author: Yolande P. Gyles
Reviews.Content: So I got my ASUS Memo Pad HD 7-inch two weeks ago, on Tuesday November 19, 2013. It's hot pink my fave colour & just too cute. And best of all I got it on sale for $129.00! Winning! So my ASUS and I have been inseparable since then, loved everything about it except the camera! That sucks! Totally sucks & I can't understand why since it's a 5MP camera, just like my cellphone, but the phone takes waaay better pics and video.But nonetheless, I digress. My ASUS picked up wifi wherever located & all was well in our relationship until Monday, Dec. 2. 2013. Not for all the money in the world & all the tea in China would the bloody thing pick up wifi. Not at home. Which was strange since everything else was picking up the wifi clearly. And not at work either. After taking it to the I.T dept. at work, who swore something was wrong with their three different wifis, and after shutting down and rebooting 70-11 million times I had to do a factory reset. That solved the problem and wifi connectivity returned. And mind you, the tablet was seeing all the wifi connections it just wasn't connecting to ANY! So anyway, connectivity returned after the factory reset but guess what back at work today - Wednesday December 4, and guess what ... I can't connect to wifi. SIGH! Now, I'm following the "to do" from the ASUS transformer forums, just did a factory reset 3 times and now going to do a cold boot! ASUS, I'm not having fun!

Reviews.Title: This is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: A.  Gray "cow lover"
Reviews.Content: I just love this tablet!  It is the perfect size for carrying with me wherever I go!  Great price too!

Reviews.Title: My First Tablet and it's a winner.
Reviews.Author: JGB
Reviews.Content: My wife purchased an Asus transformer model 10" tablet months ago and I suffered during that time from "tablet envy".  After reading reviews from varying sources over several months, I decided to take the plunge and purchased this tablet when it became available.  I've only had it for about one month and I have never used Android before.  I am slowly becoming more proficient and more comfortable with it with time.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMOPad Tablet HD7 16GB - Review
Reviews.Author: Sueki
Reviews.Content: First off.  I ordered the blue.  I was sent a black.  No big deal.  I ordered the blue because I thought it would show fingerprints less.  I've still managed to get fingerprints ALL over it.  I'll need to get some type of plastic cover.  It immediately found my wireless from my Actiontec DSL Modem (GT784WN).  The tablet is very unresponsive to my finger touch.  Maybe it's just me.  I have the same problem with my iPhone too.  No problem with a stylas.  First thing I did was sync the included kindle app with my amazon account.  I already have kindle for pc.  It synced right up.  It will now download to both the app and pc at the same time.  All with one login and one account.  There are quite a few apps loaded on it that I haven't gone through yet.  I also bought the IVSO ASUS MeMO Pad HD 7 7-inch Slim-Book PU Leather Stand Cover Case.  It comes with a stylas/pen.  It helps since my fingers don't seem to want to do the walkin'.  This tablet fits in the case just fine, but doesn't stand up like it's suppose to.  If buying something other than an ASUS HD 7 case, make sure it has an opening along the bottom back where the speaker is.  I was going to buy the Acer Iconia A1 810 tablet.  It's an 8 inch tab.  But, this one is cheaper and the only real differences are the slightly bigger size and an HDMI out on the Acer.  Since the ASUS also make the Google Nexus, ASUS has the inside track of having updates to the Android system sooner than other brands.  This ASUS is my first tablet.  I'll update as I find out new things.UPDATE: February 20, 2014 - My ASUS MeMO Pad is DEAD!  Lasted six months.  Not sure if I'll try to send back to ASUS to be fixed or try a "fix" on youtube.  Was a great tablet up until this point.  Review has gone from a 4 to a 1 star.

Reviews.Title: SCAM
Reviews.Author: Juan Jose Carrasco
Reviews.Content: WIFI AND BLUETOOTH DOESNT WORK!! it came with screen scratched!!. Save your money here. Get a crohme or a kindle

Reviews.Title: Total junk
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: If you want a tablet that constantly tells you the "SD card (was) unexpectedly removed" then this is the tablet for you.  I've tried different cards, formatting the cards, factory resetting the tablet and other "fixes" online - nothing works.  The MeMOPad is garbage and I will never purchase anything made by ASUS again.

Reviews.Title: From Victory To Defeat
Reviews.Author: Signetring54 "Signetring54"
Reviews.Content: I really started out loving this tablet. My initial reaction to using it was quite impressive, but then things started to hiccup. On some applications, like Candy Crush, the touch response feature has become quite unbearable. Pressing hard and multiple times with a stylus brings no response. It does this only intermittently, but frustrating none-the-less. I have tried loading music with the micro USB cable from my laptop with Windows 7 on to a brand new 32 GB Class 10 micro SD card, but the device could not recognize the files to play them after inserting it into the on board memory card slot. Something about a wrong format. I also tried loading the music files directly into the internal storage drive, but again could not get the Google music player or one of the top rated music player apps to either read or play them. Today, the unit stopped recognizing my AT&T; U-verse wireless internet connection stating that the signal is not strong enough. Powered unit off and back on with no success getting the wireless antennae to work on the unit. I then tried contacting ASUS for support using their live chat function, but the service is only available M-F during normal business hours. Humph! I've read most of the reviews here, but have not been able to find anyone who has mentioned the transferring music files problem. The Micro SD card also unmounted two or three times for no apparent reason while still being seated in the units on board slot. What's that all about? This is my first tablet experience and I wanted it to be frustration free. It's not going to happen with this unit. I will try to contact ASUS support on Monday to see if there is a fix for these problems.Update: Had to do a complete factory reset to get wireless working again. Humph! Have to start over from scratch now an reload all apps. Need to start over from the beginning on Candy Crush. Bummer! Does anyone know if the Memo Pad requires a special format to install music from a Windows 7 laptop using the Synchronization Function from the media player device? I just used this same function to install music to my new Moto X Phone that also uses the Android operating system with out any hiccups. I'm still on the fence about returning this unit!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We'll see if ASUS support will be able to help with the music play problem on Monday.Update: I've just learned from another reviewer that the Asus Memo Tablet will only accept MP3 downloads. What does this mean to the rest of us? Any CD's that you have ripped to your computer using Microsoft Media Player will not work!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! What? It is a format problem! How come I read all the reviews about this tablet on Amazon and a host of other sites that never mentioned this? I know rhetorical question, but OMG you mean my several hundred dollar library of CD's have now become obsolete! Then how come I was just able to transfer all these files on to my new Moto X Andriod 4.2.2 Smart Phone and play them with out any difficulties! This is absolute nonsense for Asus to have done this, maybe in conjunction with Google, and maybe to try and pry more money out of your wallet. Come on guys these are not eight track or cassette tapes!!!! If I had known this in advance, I would have looked elsewhere for a tablet. If I can't find a program to convert these CD's to an MP3 format, it's going back to Amazon and I will keep reading PDF books on my smart phone that can handle these things.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy with this
Reviews.Author: George R.
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet twice the first one worked about a month. Then stopped. The second one came DOA I wish it worked It was a Christmas present

Reviews.Title: I lost my money
Reviews.Author: Jose S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet on amazon for use in dominicam Republic, after using it for three weeks stopped working, will not start, call customer service and I told their representative in my country, but they said they only give the service to tablets they sell. Now does not that make it is very expensive to send it back to the U.S. again.

Reviews.Title: build quality, plastic screen. manufacturing defects make me want to return it., get Dell venue 7 instead
Reviews.Author: Mitchell B. Fox
Reviews.Content: I have only had it for a few days, and have not had much time to really run it through its paces yet, but I am most likely going to return it. The display, especially. in regard to video, does seem really good. I have not found the device to be generally laggy so far, although I haven't really used it with many apps, under significant "load." My real complaint is with what I saw in some other reviews and was concerned about, the build, fit and finish and overall quality. it does seem creaky, the screen does seem like it is made from plastic, and the one I got had a little glue in the seam between the screen and the rest of the body. That seem seems to be of uneven width around the device and most likely will get other gunk caught in it. I really haven't had a chance to see if it has problems or works well with various apps, but will probably return it. I have ordered, believe it or not, a Dell venue 7, which has 1gb more internal memory, a decent (from what I have read) processor, and an equivalent screen. It runs stock android and is right now at 4.2 (like the asus), rather than 4.3, I think. And it is at a similar price point.

Reviews.Title: Well
Reviews.Author: Travis R. Cole "T.Cole"
Reviews.Content: I am only giving it two stars because it seemed nice for the one day before it died. The speed seemed comparable to my Samsung galaxy s3 and the wifi worked significantly better. But as the story goes I had the tablet for two days before it wouldn't turn on. The tablet after being fully charged earlier that day was at 75% when I went to bed. Tried to turn it on in the morning and nothing. I thought maybe the battery was dead so put it to charge and tried it later. Nothing. Did the 60 second power button push and nothing. Tried charging again through the computer and nothing. End story it never turned back on. Sent it back to Amazon and waiting for a refund.I thought I would add some additional info. I did like the asus additions to the andriod OS. There is a battery monitoring app and also an app usage that can be used to kill idling apps to free up memory.  However the night before my tablet died it downloaded and installed a new version of the Asus software. Not sure if that is what caused it but it worked perfectly fine when I went to bed and I just closed my case leaving it in sleep mode (it should have still been on).  It seemed solidly performing for the price but it also seems there might be glitches in software somewhere as others have mentioned freezing and lock ups.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Dgcl
Reviews.Content: I like it.The resolution is amazing!But the second day, it suddenly it turned offI got to turned it on by pressing the power button and the volume down button at the same time, and now it's still working, so far.

Reviews.Title: EVERYTHING PERFECT EXCEPT MEDIA SUPPORT.
Reviews.Author: moolgun
Reviews.Content: EVERYTHING PERFECT EXCEPT MEDIA SUPPORT.IT REALLY SUCKS.YOU CANNOT JUST DRAG AVI FILE IN TO PLAY.YOU NEED TO CONVERT ALL TYPE MEDIA FILES TO MPEG-4 FORMAT WHICH IS REALLY ANNOYING.BUT THE OTHER FEATURES ARE BETTER THAN MY GALXACY TAB 3 8.0.APPEARANCE IS LITTLE BIT CHEAP.

Reviews.Title: MEGA TABLET FOR MEGA PRICE! (UPDATE horrible GPS)
Reviews.Author: Janet Mieses "Janet Mieses"
Reviews.Content: I had a samsung galaxy tab 2 and this beats everything about it, I loved my samsung but  samsung cant beat it for the price, i got this for 129.99 and the samsung for 170 and this uses a quad-core and the colors are simply amazing, it weights less the the samsung and it uses mini usb2 so i can charge it using my PC while the samsung could not  charge with my pc so i had the used the wall charger which was an awful experience. Now i can transfer files via usb while charging. TUPDATE:THE GPS IS BAD, IT USES AGPS instead of real GPS like the tab 2 had, this is huge problem now for me, because in the road offline no wifi it can reach gps but only when the car stops not while running like my tab 2 did.  In other words the tab 2 still has a really good gps system, this one is horrible.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work properly
Reviews.Author: Williams "Ethan"
Reviews.Content: Well recieved this product yesterday and it Just doesn't work properly. The screen does not rotate at all except for certain apps. The netflix app is terrible, I received some sound but there was no video whatsover. Everything else with the tablet i liked, Switching between apps and all the android features seemed to run very well for the price of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the money but......
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good tablet but flimsy,  SD card slot does not hold the card securely and card has to be reseated frequently.  Cheap feel, fit and finish are not great.  Functions well, battery life is good, camera is above what I expected. Screen smudges easily and is hard to clean. Would like a hard case/cover but can't find one.  Sits at a sweet spot for price so I would buy again.  Minor upgrades would make this a really sweet tablet.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Omega Clarke
Reviews.Content: i but this for my cuz,just for her to have tablet experience at her age,but i am impress with the device performance when i play with first i would recommended for anyone how want to get one for someone for the holiday as a gift just to get them into the world of tablet.

Reviews.Title: Arts and Science
Reviews.Author: C120
Reviews.Content: I like this company - I like the products - Buy this product if you like to - Expect the Arts & Science Undergraduate Society to deliver - Nice display - Nice software - Quick - Responsive. No Safari no problem embrace the PHABLET experience - Are you the person phone from a handle computer platform - Stop - No - Don'tASUS no funny biz. The motherboards are nice to.

Reviews.Title: Battery Problem
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The BATTERY needs charging every time I use the MeMoPad - all I use it for is reading ebooks and occasionally check email.WotUp? Acer?Also, your Deliverer is not coming to my apartment address - just leaves the notice lying around - I only noticed it 3-4 days later.Please ask the deliverer to attach notice to my mailbox - after giving me a call!TX Amazon - your stuff is always good - I will continue our relationship!Best RegardsM.I. Bennetts

Reviews.Title: its 5 star, just missing GPS...hence 4.
Reviews.Author: Manik Kumar
Reviews.Content: its 5 star, just missing GPS...hence 4 star only. Everything else about the tablet is perfect at this little price...

Reviews.Title: AWFUL EXPERIENCE
Reviews.Author: Pedro Garrido
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet august 29-2013 and when I press home button that show me a message the launcher has stopped and dont allow me to do anything, I call to asus support and they told me to fix the tablet I have to send it to him. I have to wait for use the tablet

Reviews.Title: still not with me
Reviews.Author: Ifigenia Rangel
Reviews.Content: Hello Everyone, i still dont have my tablet because i live in Venezuela and i sent it to my sister house in the USA, but i must say that is a very good tablet i dont need to use it to write an excellent review.. my sister told me looks very nice and not cheap at all !!!!i really like it i cant wait to have it  in my own hand. i bought two accesories for it ..Fintie Folio Case for ASUS MeMO Pad HD ME173X 7-inch Tablet Slim Fit With Stylus Holder - PurpleEvecase 7~8 inch Tablet Ultraportable Neoprene Zipper Carrying Case with Dual Hidden Pocket & Handle -- Hot Pink/ Green

Reviews.Title: Standby time
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wrong color (black vs package marking stating it was blue). Other then that works great. Now to see if I can increase the time before it goes into standby mode.

Reviews.Title: it's no ipad
Reviews.Author: NYC consumer
Reviews.Content: Honestly, as a long time Apple user, wanting not to spend too much on a tablet- it is a bit of a disappointment. I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: no flash player :(
Reviews.Author: terez
Reviews.Content: So far, This tablet is good for generic kinds of functions like reading and using the internet, EXCEPT, That This DOES NOT SUPPORT ADOBE FLASH PLAYER. I am really quite angry about that and it greatly limits my activities and even on sites like facebook.

Reviews.Title: BBB of California - over 1000 complaints against ASUS - read them first!
Reviews.Author: jhix
Reviews.Content: Research the forums and BBB before you purchase an ASUS product.  I received a TF700t whose screen cracked all by itself one day...found out that this is a recurring problem and the BBB has 1000's of compaints against the company - they don't stand by their products - $265 to fix a defective screen when we paid $380 for the tablet?  No thank you, Asus

Reviews.Title: MeMOPad HD 7" 17 GB Tablet, Blue
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Fox
Reviews.Content: I have hardly used it -- there always seems to be something preventing me from going forward. I have only had it a couple of weeks and hope to master it SOON!

Reviews.Title: Firmware update doesn't work
Reviews.Author: JCIttner
Reviews.Content: We bought this tablet for 1 very important feature - it runs Android 4.2, which should support multiple users login. It's supposedly to be a family tablet, so daddy, mommy, big sister and little brother can each set up our own login user account. Unfortunately, it runs Android version 4.2.1. So we ran a firmware update, which was supposedly to update to version 4.2.2. Nope, nada! Nothing happens. I just finished an online chat session with ASUS tech support. He's very nice, but he has no idea how to re-trigger the firmware update. Just wait, it takes time for update to fully download, he wrote. Yeah, I don't see it happening any time soon. We are returning this one... :-(

Reviews.Title: HORRRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Content: do not buy it for closes cant save anything on it the camera on front and back are horrible resolution
